sections.heading: existence; continuation.Corporate existence of a mutual insurer reorganizing pursuant to the Mutual Insurance Holding Company Act shall not terminate, but the reorganized stock insurer shall be deemed to be a continuation of the mutual insurer and to have been organized on the date the mutual insure
sections.text: existence; continuation.Corporate existence of a mutual insurer reorganizing pursuant to the Mutual Insurance Holding Company Act shall not terminate, but the reorganized stock insurer shall be deemed to be a continuation of the mutual insurer and to have been organized on the date the mutual insurer was originally organized.SourceLaws 1997, LB 740, ยง 11.
